name: Artificial Evilness
description:
Artificial Evilness is a short story-telling puzzle platformer with a rich story-line and 3 unique endings.

STORY: You're just an avarege programmer that accidently creates an evil AI. Will you betray it? Or will you collaborate with it? Maybe you'll do something even more crazy?

GAMEPLAY: A story based RPG inspired 2,5D platformer with puzzles, platforming sections, multiple choices and a bit of sweet exploration. The game itself is really short, but you won't be disapointed.

GAME MADE FOR WOWIE GAME JAM 2022
